data.message: All I can say is if eminem or ice cube or Dr Dre snoop Dogg or anyone part of NWA came to nova Scotia if would definitely  be worth their trip and it would be a sold out crowd for months not a night for months even weeks Europe may be the place they always play and have played but I guarantee 100% we would give them a sold out crowd everyday night just ask Kevin Hart and he was a comedian SOLDOUT so if anyone that reads this and has connections especially with EMINEM nova Scotia Canada would make you the sales hands down your an amazing artist best rapper and you would not be disappointed
